name: Meta Platforms
description: Meta is a global leader in social media and technology, pioneering advancements in virtual reality and artificial intelligence. With a focus on connecting people worldwide, Meta drives innovation in communication platforms and immersive digital experiences to shape the future of the internet.

name: Apple Inc.
description: Apple designs and manufactures cutting-edge consumer electronics and software. With iconic products like the iPhone and Mac, Apple leads the market in innovation, user privacy, and sustainable technology.

name: Amazon
description: Amazon is a global e-commerce and cloud computing giant, providing logistics solutions and AI-powered innovations. With AWS, Amazon leads in cloud infrastructure while redefining retail experiences worldwide.

name: Netflix
description: Netflix is a leading entertainment service offering streaming and original content. With a focus on global storytelling and data-driven insights, Netflix delivers personalized viewing experiences to millions worldwide.

name: Google LLC
description: Google is a technology powerhouse specializing in search engines, AI, and cloud computing. Through innovation in machine learning and digital ecosystems, Google drives the future of information access and technological progress.
